comments.body: Since you're making a global value declaration, why not just make `Plaid` a global namespace that exports 3 functions?
I'm sorry I don't understand this request, do you have an example of what you're looking for?

I tested this and it does not work as expected. Plaid-link loads via a script and is made available on the window object. Without it in the declare global Window TS throws: Property 'Plaid' does not exist on type 'Window'.
Here is a sandbox with an example implementation: https://codesandbox.io/s/8k2qll1900?fontsize=14&module=%2Fsrc%2FPlaidComponent%2FPlaidComponent.tsx
Hey @DanielRosenwasser if you get a chance mind looking at the above?
